title: French strike drives BlaBlaCar popularity
text:
French strike drives BlaBlaCar popularity 12:29pm EDT - 01:27 
BlaBlaCar, the carsharing company that connects drivers and passengers travelling to a common destination, has seen a sharp increase in popularity as a result of train strikes in France. Laura Frykberg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
BlaBlaCar, the carsharing company that connects drivers and passengers travelling to a common destination, has seen a sharp increase in popularity as a result of train strikes in France. Laura Frykberg reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2K00Zg2
